name: Wizard's Beard
summary: Explore enemy-infested areas to find items and loot, or kill enemies and take their stuff! Go through strange doors, fight new enemies, defeat powerful bosses, gain unique abilities, and find strong items, all while trying to not die. There are several different routes you can go through, with actions in game and choices in dialogue all affecting different elements throughout the game. Some of which you might not even notice until the end.. Have fun finding all the endings!
